Really hope to stay here again! Can't say enough good things about this experience :)
Great location. Walking distance to food and parks.

Stayed at Scott's while visiting friends in Walla Walla. Very quiet and clean. Loved the comfy bed and Adirondack chairs out front. Highly recommend staying here if you plan on eating at restaurants during your stay. Close to downtown and Mill Creek trail for biking/jogging.
Great place to stay for a weekend in Walla Walla. Perfect location to walk into town and the place was clean and nice! Thank you to Scott and Marqui, we will definitely be back

Awesome host, great location for an easy walk to town. The home was the perfect size for the two of us. It was clean and had the amenities we were looking for. All in all it was a perfect place and location for us.
This space is clean, bright, and well decorated. Great location and we felt very safe and relaxed!

This was a perfect place for a weekend stay. The house is well equipped, nicely maintained and was very clean. I appreciated Scott and Marqui checking in with me throughout my time to make sure I had everything I needed. And the place also had a great private feel as well. Would definitely stay again!
Great cozy spot! Super easy stroll to downtown. Scott is so easy to communicate with and strives to make your stay easy. We had a great time! We will be back!
The place is awesome—very cute, clean and convenient. Scott was also an awesome host. We would definitely stay here again.
Scott and Marqui’s space is cute, clean, comfortable and very conveniently located! They are very responsive hosts who give guests a lot of privacy.
Perfect little place to stay and convenient location!

Scott and Marqui’s place was so cute and cozy! The place was super clean when I arrived. It’s close to Downtown Walla Walla, so that is super convenient! Would definitely recommend and would love to come back!
Cute place rt next to the college. Great host.

I have been a quest at Scott's place several times and it is always a treat. Super convenient, private, cozy and very clean are just a few of the reasons I keep coming back. I love the off street parking and proximity to downtown.
I can't wait to visit Walla Walla again and stay at Scott's place. Perfect location, safe, and so clean. My toddler and I fit just fine in the queen bed. Thank you for everything!
this place is so lovely, great location, clean space and Scott is so friendly and helpful.
Cozy space with a great location to downtown! Hosts were friendly, flexible, and had great advice for our stay. Perfect getaway!

We stayed at Scott’s place on our way home from a road trip, and had such a wonderful time. The place was super clean, very comfortable, in a prime location, and Scott’s hospitality was outstanding. Thanks again Scott for a great stay and for all your Walla Walla recommendations!

Scott’s walla walla studio was perfect for our weekend getaway. The place is clean, comfortable, well appointed, and Scott is a wonderful host, he’s easy to get ahold of, gave great local winery and food recommendations but also allowed us our privacy. We will definitely be back to stay at Scott’s Airbnb for our next walla walla trip!

Great cottage, with great off-street parking and access - located very close to the Whitman college campus, and convenient to all highways surrounding. We absolutely adored this cozy little space. The hosts were extremely attentive and the location was just perfect. We would definitely stay here again.

This is a quiet, super-comfortable, stylishly done place. I stayed for two days, and I'll look for Scott's accommodation the next time I'm in town. It's a comfortable walk to downtown and back through a gorgeous neighborhood and the Whitman College campus.
Great location, quiet and private. A perfect studio for two.
5 stars across the board! Scott’s place is very nice, great location and immaculately clean! Highly recommend and will stay again next time I am in town for work.
This is an excellent place to stay!
This place is so great! This was our second time staying here. It’s perfect for a weekend of wine tasting and Scott is super responsive. We love it and will definitely be returning!

Lovely little backyard cottage, lots of privacy, great location within walking distance of the college and downtown. This was our third time here, and we've loved it every time!
Scott and Marqui’s place was perfect for our stop in Walla Walla! A great, safe location and easy walking distance to town! Very clean and we had everything we needed! We would definitely stay again!

This cute little, air-conditioned abode is exactly as the pictures show. Great little economical yet cozy and comfortable cottage like space.

Scott's place was a perfect location and was everything we needed to make our holiday in Walla Walla delightful.

Scott and his wife met us in person and we’re very accommodating. The space was perfect and led to a lovely walk through campus to get in to town. Highly recommend this space for anyone looking for a romantic get away for the weekend!

Marqui and Scott are fantastic hosts with a lovely place. Beautiful, relaxing accommodations with access to a private backyard and patio space. Spotless and very comfortable with extremely accommodating hosts.

great place near downtown and Whitman college. Perfect for 2. Nice owners and greeting on arrival. Super communications. We'll go back

We will definitely be back !
Relaxing and very fun place to stay. Wish we had more than 1 night there.
Amazing experience, we will be back!

Joyce and I sincerely appreciated Dan and Teresa sharing their lovely home and would recommend the "Honeymoon Suite" to anyone seeking a relaxing and fun time.

The apartment itself was well equipped and cool in the heat.
There is no tv- which we loved.
A wonderful place to stay! Only 10 minutes from town. Quiet, peaceful and very comfortable. The hosts were very attentive and helpful. Plenty of room for the two of us. We will definitely return!

If you are looking for a quiet, calm, clean, private place to stay in Walla Walla this is it! We loved our stay and would absolutely stay again. Feeding the mini donkeys was so fun. They are the sweetest little guys and we miss them already!

The Q Corral was such a pleasant stay. It was so peaceful out there. They have a couple special greeters named Benny (their dog) and Elton John (their cat) who both have a ton of personality. Benny is quite respectful and likes to play fetch. The apartment above the garage had everything we needed. A spacious living room, a well equipped kitchen and a sun deck. They even had a complimentary bottle of wine waiting for us.
The Q Corral is about 10-12 minutes from town. 5 minutes from Wine valley golf course and steps from the creek near by if you need to cool of from the heat.
We will definitely be back the next time we’re in Walla Walla .
We loved everything about our stay at the Q corral. We will definitely stay again. Everything was so comfortable and the hospitality was amazing. Thank you so much for everything.

Loved our stay at Q Corral, the apartment was spacious, well decorated and had everything we needed! All the animals were very friendly and fun to interact with. We also got to enjoy some of the freshest eggs which were delicious! Thank you for such an amazing experience and we look forward to being back!
A wonderful place to stay and relax! A beautiful rural setting with farm animals and a great location to wineries as well as downtown Walla Walla. My new favorite!
Great place, period!
Loved our stay and will definitely be back! Highly recommend. :)

The Q Corral was one of the nicest, good value, Air B&Bs that we have ever stayed at. The apartment was very clean with a super comfortable bed with various pillow options, and the nicely decorated, rooms were spacious. In particular, the large bathroom was unusual for many smaller 2-3 person Air B&Bs. We also appreciated that all of the rooms were very well lite. The unexpected purified water tap in the kitchen sink was wonderful. The parking was very convenient. However, there are some steps to access the apartment. We did not at all miss the lack of television, and more importantly, Wi-Fi connection was very good. We also found that the location above the garage to be very quiet. If we stay in Walla Walla Area, we will most definitely return to the Q Corral.
We absolutely loved this gem 💎 ❤️ such a relaxing and cozy apartment. Our boys loved all of the animals 💗 cant wait for our next trip to walla walla, we hope to be able to stay agin soon.

Good location. Not far from town.
Nice accommodations.
a most beautiful, peaceful and welcoming place we had ever been , a place everyone needs to visit just to have a moment of calm and peace , beautiful from the room to the hospitality we were given

A great place to experience Walla Walla from; the apartment is super spacious and bright, with lots of great light. Super close to town and being able to visit and offer a treat to all the animals was a highlight for us. Would absolutely stay again!

We throughly enjoyed our stay at the Private Apartment at the Q Corral. The apartment was so spacious with everything we needed, complete with a deck facing west. Our wonderfully generous host, Alicia, left a bottle of red wine and a box of chocolates that were delicious which we savored. The location on their beautiful property offered a quiet retreat for us to relax in. We truly enjoyed spending time with Alicia, Bob, Benny the dog, horses, donkeys and chickens. This is one of my very favorite Airbnb accommodations I have ever experienced and would book a stay there again sometime.

Wife and I had a fantastic experience staying at the Q Corral. It was a highlight of our visit to Walla Walla. Great place for those wishing to be away from downtown Walla Walla and find rest near the country side. Location is not far from several wineries and historical sites.
We will definitely try to book this place next time we visit Walla Walla!
This is such a peaceful and beautiful retreat. It was just what we needed and can’t wait to visit again!
A beautiful and relaxing place to stay with everything you might need. Will definitely stay here again!
Very clean and inviting. We loved our stay.

This is an excellent little farm experience just far enough out of town for some peace and quiet but close enough to town that it’s not inconvenient. Quiet and cute and clean. Great value for a small family or two couples. The animals are sweet and friendly and it has everything you need. No tv, but that is one thing that makes it great. The host has done a great job making this a great place to stay.
Q Corral was the most amazing experience! I already miss my new donkey and horse friends. Alicia was a fabulous host! The place is clean, comfortable and wonderful.
Alicia's place is our favorite place to stay in Walla Walla. It's clean, quiet and very comfortable.
Dreamy spot to rest or take off for activities. Excellent host, wonderful space.

Bob and Alicia's place is a perfect place to enjoy a Walla Walla wine exploration trip. The description matched what we experienced and the location was really peaceful and relaxing. The check in and check out process was straightforward and the communication with the host was very responsive to the few questions we had.
The kitchen had what we needed and everything worked perfectly , and most important the bed was comfortable. Since it's still cool at night, we appreciated how quickly the place was able to warm up and get comfortable. The furnishings were very comfortable and the place was spotless. After a busy day visiting the great wineries available in Walla Walla, being able to completely relax was much appreciated.
The bonus was getting a chance to walk the area, feed the donkeys, play a bit with Benny, and enjoy the freshest eggs for breakfast possible!

Our family had a wonderful stay--the unit is spacious, set up very well, and it worked great for a family with young kids. We loved the setting and the deck was a great place to enjoy an exceptional bottle of wine provided by the hosts. We definitely hope to stay at the Q Corral next time we are in Walla Walla.

We can’t recommend this place highly enough! It’s the perfect location to explore Walla Walla from. Alicia and Bob were wonderful too. Make sure to set aside some time to explore their property and interact with all of the animals!

Great place! Clean, nicely decorated, and comfortable. Donkeys and chickens and horses, oh my! Wild turkeys wandering across the yard at dawn, egrets nesting in the trees by the creek. I'm a sucker for good coffee first thing in the morning (they have it). Fresh eggs for breakfast, too. Extra blankets and pillows (yay!). A short 10 minute drive to downtown Walla Walla. One Walla Walla warning: if you are coming in an EV, be prepared to scrounge for (slow) charging. Walla Walla is a charging desert.

This place is amazing! Alicia has made the unit super inviting with an at home feeling. The décor is calming, the furniture comfortable and the unit is very clean and spacious. Upon arrival we found all the amenities, as time went on we found so many little things that made the stay even more awesome. Fresh cream in the fridge, farm fresh eggs straight out of the coop, multiple bed pillow options, very well supplied kitchen... the list goes on. The location is super convenient to wineries and to downtown where there are multiple tasting rooms (just a short, easy drive). We stayed three nights and had incredible meals in town. All those very cool things aside, the property is great! As you enter your unit, upstairs and super private, there are 4 very friendly and quiet donkeys. The dog (didn't catch his name) is friendly and not in your face (well a tiny bit...just enough), horses on the property in the distance, and a deck to watch the sunset. All in all we would definitely stay here again and hope to when we get back to Walla Walla. Thank you Alicia for an amazing stay!

Be sure and gather some eggs from the chicken coop every morning for breakfast! You may have to reach under the setting chicken to get them but, hey, get your farmer fantasy going!! We had a great time staying here. There was a heron rookery just 300 yards from the house and I saw an owl one night as he was perched on the peak of the roof. All in all, a very pleasant place to spend some time.

Spacious, bright and clean, this is a lovely spot and it's easy to see the care that Ben and Alicia have put into it. From complimentary coffee, wireless phone chargers on the nightstands, plentiful pillows of varying firmness and a cleaning regimen that leaves even the window blinds dust free, this place is a treasure. We really enjoyed staying here and getting to visit with the animals too!

A true retreat! Alicia’s place is a perfect hideaway from the daily grind- the space is cozy yet spacious enough to spread out with a good book and cup of tea. The welcoming touches of real cream, fresh roasted coffee and bottle of wine were a surprise. We appreciated the immaculate space and attention to COVID precautions. Most of all, the miniature donkeys were the highlight of our stay. Can’t wait to return!
Highly recommend ! Super clean and nice , they have the cutest dog and the kids loved petting the donkeys ! Would definitely book again.

This has to be the cleanest AirBNB rental that ever stayed at. It truly was spotless. It’s pretty much as advertised…a cute little apartment above a garage on a farm in the middle of wine country. There’s a big, friendly dog, numerous chickens, and some miniature donkeys right outside your door. But somehow, it manages to be super quiet. The king- sized bed was very comfy and the place was well equipped. The nice bottle of wine that was awaiting us was much appreciated. A big thumbs up and we’d gladly stay here again.
Loved it!

Perfect stay. It has all you need - plates, cups, cutlery, cookware, towels, comfy pillows, great seating area, no TV (yes that’s a plus!) and its location is beautiful. If I ever have the need to stay in Walla Walla again this will be my top pick and I’ll spend more time outside! I loved time on the back deck in the sun and I wish I had gone for a walk around the pasture.
Wonderful cozy apartment with field views and close to wineries. Alicia was a fantastic host, great communication, and even came to the rescue when I inadvertently locked myself out.

We had a wonderful stay at Q Corral! The apartment was spotlessly clean, thoughtfully put together and stocked with essentials. The location is lovely as it’s a quiet area surrounded by farmland, but only a quick 10-15 min drive to town and even closer to some wineries. The miniature donkeys are adorable! We felt very at home and comfortable. We were pleasantly surprised to find a king bed that was quite comfortable!
The apartment is above their garage which is used mornings and evenings for their chores. You could hear some doors open and close but nothing that disturbed us. We appreciated their quick replies to questions, the delicious coffee, and breakfast snacks provided.
We will absolutely stay again on our next trip to Walla Walla!

This place is very nice. Nice and clean. The bed is comfy. It’s nice that it is out in the country yet still close enough that you can get to town quickly. The host is super nice and helpful. Loved that we could go say hi to the animals that are on the property. The only slight issue is that it is an apartment right above their garage which the use on a regular as they live on the property. Made it kind of feel like we had to be quiet all the time (slightly difficult with a very active 3 year old) and kind of felt like we were “invading” their home.

My kids and I LOVED this place. Such nice spot and we couldn’t get enough of the animals. She left snacks and tea which we definitely enjoyed. And fresh eggs in the morning was such a treat!!!!! Thank you!!!!

This place met and exceeded our expectations. The entire apartment is thoughtfully put together, and the hosts are kind and communicative. A perfect home to visit Walla Walla and enjoy a peaceful country setting.
15/10 would stay again!

This is the perfect vacation rental! Clean, cute, private, beautiful view, plenty of space. The perfect place for a cozy weekend getaway. The friendly animals made it feel even more cozy and welcoming. Host is professional, thorough, and thoughtful.
This is wonderful location and the property is beautiful. The apartment itself was very clean had everything we needed. The animals were a delight and we loved the fresh eggs!

It's a great place very accessible to most wineries in Walla Walla. Got some good winery suggestions from the host and they definitely lived up to it. We got to play with the dog and feed the donkeys and also got to see a nice sunset. Missed out on the farm fresh eggs which I'll look forward to next time. Overall, It was a fun stay and would recommend!

This place is immaculate and looks very new. The kitchen is stocked with coffee, tea, oatmeal packets, etc. The blankets and linens are of good quality and clean. One of the most important features to us in a rental is a comfortable bed, and the king bed here is very comfortable. Also it is covered with a variety of pillows, so you’re bound to find one you like.
The location is a short drive to town and multiple wineries.
The miniature donkeys are fun to pet and feed (Alicia leaves a bucket of treats for the occupants to give them). And, of course, their dog Benny is friendly and gentle. We saw deer in the pasture both days we were there.
We will definitely stay again.
Q Corral is a great home base for a weekend of wine tasting or historical visiting in Walla Walla! Super clean, bright and cute space--would go back again.

Alicia and Bob were fabulous hosts! The private apartment over their 3-car garage includes a kitchenette with full-size stove, fridge, and dishwasher; a cozy living room with comfortable love seat and chairs; a cute and well-equipped bathroom; and a bedroom with a very comfy king-sized bed. Additionally, there's a lovely deck overlooking their bucolic setting outside of town. They've thought of just about every possible amenity already, but if you need anything else, a quick text gets a very prompt response.
They have horses, cows, chickens, a couple of adorable donkeys, and a joyful dog, and encourage you to interact with them if so choose. Additionally, the chickens provided us with delicious, fresh eggs for breakfast!
The location is terrific and so quiet you could hear a pin drop! It's very close to several notable wineries, and just a few miles from downtown Walla Walla, where another 30 or so wineries await you within a few blocks of each other.
My husband and I will definitely be back to the Q Corral the next time we're in the area. It was an exceptional experience.

This is my second time staying there and everything was as perfect as before. Didn't get to play with Benny, this time but hopefully the next. The mini donkeys and horses are always fun to pet and give the treats provided. Looking forward to a return visit hopefully next year!
The Q Corral was a very a fun and comfortable place to stay. Everything was just perfect and Alicia was a great host. This is a nice location out in the country, but close to town and wineries.
Just a wonderful place.
Very cute and comfortable stay. I appreciated the coffee, chilled water and cream available just for me! Bed is huge and comfortable. Thank you for the stay!

I’ve stayed at Alicia’s Airbnb twice. It’s in a quiet rural area near Walla Walla, with an easy and scenic drive into town. The apartment has a well-stocked kitchen, a comfortable bed with very nice linens, a great living room with a lovely sunset view, and it’s immaculately clean and fresh. The little donkeys are charming and seemed to appreciate an apple and pear I shared with them. I’ll bring more next time!
Great place to stay when you’re in Walla Walla. Close enough to town but a nice quiet country setting. My wife had great fun giving the donkeys their morning treat. Would definitely revisit

AMAZING STAY! Donkeys are so friendly (plenty of treats to share) and the garden is awesome. Alicia was kind enough to allow guests to take any of her vegetables and flowers! The bed was incredibly comfy and plenty of space for us to roam. We loved being so close to the wineries (Reininger was our fav at recommendation from Alicia) and the Whitman memorial. Stay here if you can!!
Great place, great location!!!
We loved our stay! Alicia’s apartment was very comfortable, clean, and well equipped! We enjoyed all the farm animals too. :)

This location is 10 stars. Alicia checked to make sure we had tickets for the Pendleton Round-Up, all the extras were provided and we felt like we were at home. We appreciated there was no tv, so we could enjoy our time with friends and were pleasantly surprised with a Murphy bed for our guests. Stay here!

Fantastic stay! Beautiful views. Alicia thought about everything. She supplied the things we didn’t even know we had forgotten. The home is beautifully decorated very comfy. Looking forward to out next visit to the Corral. The cherry on top of it all was the two mini donkeys that would greet us each time we came or went.

This place was amazing. So cute inside and beautiful outside. Close to shopping , wineries and great restaurants. We stayed here our wedding weekend and they let us take pictures with the mini donkeys in our wedding attire! We enjoyed coffee on the deck overlooking the farm. Would definitely stay here again
Close to Whitman Historic site, wineries and thriving downtown Walla Walla

5 stars is not enough for the Q Coral! We had an amazing stay and can't wait to stay again soon. Alicia was a great communicator and an outstanding host. She has added so many little touches to the space like extra pillows/bedding, amazing coffee/cream, and even cold water waiting for us in the fridge. We could not get enough of all the animals to include the donkeys and their dog Benny! We saw packs of deer from the wonderful porch and it was a perfect serene location to unplug a bit. We also visited many wineries suggested and had an absolute blast. Best airbnb stay in a long time, we will be back!!
We had a great time at the Q coral! Clean and quiet with kid friendly touches my nieces loved. Great spot to pick for Palouse falls and general exploration in the area.
We had a wonderful stay at Q Corral. The place is even better than pictures with a super comfy king size bed and such a wonderful layout. Can’t wait to come back!
The apartment is beautiful, clean and cozy. Very convenient to Walla Walla and Whitman college. Hosts were friendly and accommodating.

We just stayed one night on our way back from Idaho and enjoyed our last stop here before heading back home. And we felt really lucky to find this place as it is usually booked. The apartment is very comfortable, super clean, well lit, and has lovely personal touches.
Such a wonderful place - comfy and well appointed with a lovely balcony and the added plus of adorable donkeys, horses, and very playful doggie!

Gorgeous place, beautiful views, especially enjoyed the horses and donkeys. The donkeys are to the left of the house. I didn’t discover them until my last day. They had such a funny personally. Actually so did the horses! There are treats inside the door to feed them, which is really fun.
And their dog is so cute. He has these wild eye brows! I wish I could have spent more time with him!!
It’s a cool place!
Everything was wonderful. The apartment was great and the property was wonderful. Our kids loved the animals. We would definitely stay there again!
Great place. Loved the deck in the morning, and staying just out of town. Alicia was very helpful. We look forward to staying here again.

Staying at Q Corral was one of the loveliest Airbnb stays I've had in a long time. Alicia's attentiveness and attention to detaill surpassed expectations. She went above and beyond to ensure we had a nice stay. We had a wonderful time in Walla Walla and a large portion of that was thanks to this beautiful home! Our one year old son especially loved feeding the horses and donkeys.
Wonderful place to stay! My daughter had the best time greeting the animals in the morning.

Alicia is the hostest with the mostest! There was nothing that we needed at her lovely place that we didn't find, especially the air conditioner for those 100+ degree days that hit us in August. My son loved the Murphy bed that pulled down from the wall and had some of his best sleeps ever. We loved being out in the country after our trips to the wineries. Quite a few wineries were just minutes from her place, but it was great to go for nice long walks among the horses, cows, donkeys, and crop land. The place was like brand new and spotless. Would definitely return upon my next trip to Seattle -- worth the drive!

Everything was just perfect. So clean and comfortable. The setting on the farm with the access to animal visits, and only about a 10 or so minute drive into town was ideal. We would recommend this place to a friend!

Alicia place was perfect. Clean, quaint, well appointed. Everything we needed for our short time in Walla Walla. Make sure to spend a few minutes for fetch with their awesome dog, he will love it!!!
Great stay! Thanks Alicia.
Bob and Alicia are terrific hosts and the Q Corral is lovely! Nice to be outside of town in a rural setting but close enough to everything.

Lovely, lovely space. Very comfortable, clean, relaxing. It was close enough to town but also very quiet and beautiful. Good internet connection, which was important because I needed to be on Zoom a lot. Hope to return again. Alicia is a wonderful host!

My husband and I stayed here on a long weekend to celebrate our anniversary. It was perfect! The farm is beautiful and peaceful. The apartment was spacious, clean, cute and very comfortable with all the amenities you need. Alicia and Bob were wonderful hosts. We cannot recommend the Q Corral enough and can’t wait for our next Walla Walla visit.

After much consideration, we chose to book at the Q Corral. It’s always hard to tell from photos if the space will live up to expectations. This space absolutely did. High ceilings, lots of windows, and well laid out space. Special touches such as coffee and cream, and some often forgotten toiletries are a nice addition. The bathroom has a nicely tiled tub and is quite large. Shower got hot and water pressure was good. Lots of pillow options, plenty of blankets. Good WiFi and cooling system. Easy check in and out. And a gorgeous property with the friendliest pup. What’s not to like? We loved our time here and think you will, too.
Wonderful stay, I highly recommend! Our family of 4 enjoyed the farm, were very comfortable, and loved the location. This exceeded expectations.
A lovely place to stay, close to everything.

We had a wonderful time, beautiful and relaxing setting. Enjoyed meeting all the animals on our walks. The apartment is cozy, clean and comfortable. Alicia was easy to communicate with before and during our stay.

Q Corral apartment was the perfect place for our 2 night stay. A nice, quiet place to wind down at the end of the day. Great deck to have breakfast in the mornings. Close proximity to several wineries.
Great getaway in the country! Relaxing and peaceful. Thoughtful host. Highly recommend if you're looking for a quiet place outside of town but close to wineries!
Very nice & comfortable place! We'll definitely be back!
We enjoy our stay and agree with all the previous positive reviews…. We will book with Alicia again if we make it back to Walla Walla.
Really enjoyed the rural peace and quiet
We had a perfect weekend at Q Corral. The apartment is charming and clean. Alicia was an amazing host and her property is truly a special place.
Beautiful apartment & property— we loved it!
Very beautiful rural setting. Facility is comfortable and well equipped. Host/hostess are very responsive.

Absolutely beautiful setting! Feels private and serene. Apartment is airy, but comfortable. The view out of every window was lovely. Benny & the donkeys welcomed us every time we came back. Kitchen is small, but plenty sufficient. Bed is very comfy! It’s a combo of shabby chic and modern.
Would definitely recommend. Good value!

The Q Corral is a little slice of heaven. The apartment is bigger and more charming than the photos lead too and it is filled with everything you need for a great getaway to the beautiful area. Take a walk down to the horses in the morning and then sit on the deck in the evening to watch the gorgeous sunset. A stop at Cugini's on the way back from town is a must.

We enjoyed our stay at Q Coral so much! The apartment is open, spacious and very comfortable! The bed and pillows are so comfy...great night’s sleep! It is close to some wineries and a short drive to tons more...and downtown Walla Walla. We were greeted right away by Benny - the most friendly dog - and visited Burr and Ito as soon as we got there. Loved there were treats provided so we could feed the mini donkeys and horses. We had a fresh bottle of cream, cold water and bottle of wine waiting for us...and snack of cheese and apple! We enjoyed our stay so much and will definitely look at Alicia’s place again when we come back to the area!

Q Corral had everything we needed for a long weekend out in Walla Walla! A short drive to downtown and wineries. Also a great starting point for bike riding on the west side of town. We appreciated the way Alicia went the extra mile and made for a wonderful stay. We will be back!
Beautiful countryside location and wonderful hospitality. We had a peaceful and comfortable stay. Thank you!
Great place to stay!

Lovely space, very thoughtful hostess! Alicia's place is quiet, relaxing, spacious, and clean. I really appreciated her clear communication and the cold water waiting for me in the fridge after my long drive. I wouldn't hesitate to book this gem again on a future visit to Walla Walla.
This is such a beautiful homestead! Horses, chickens, donkeys. Private space that is so warm and inviting.

We were looking for a quiet place out of town and close to our favorite westside wineries. Alicia's place was just perfect! We enjoyed our time here very much. The apartment is very clean and stylishly decorated. The linens were good quality and bed/pillows very comfy! Alicia left some very thoughtful and generous refreshments. We cannot wait to return!
Accommodations were gorgeous and very clean. The location is beautiful, love the country side setting. Thank you for our treats and for a wonderful stay!
Alicia’s place is adorable, spacious, and a lovely setting. She was very responsive and helpful with local tips. We would not hesitate to stay here again if/when we take another trip to Walla Walla.

The property was beautiful and everything was as expected! We did not need to request anything from the hosts but they provided us all information we needed prior to arrival! The animals and lovely porch were an added plus!

This is a wonderful place to stay - near wineries and in a lovely setting. It has a full kitchen which we used more often than we anticipated as many area restaurants were closed on Sunday. We slept so well in the comfy bed. The place is very well designed - perched up a flight of steps and with wonderful views. Of course, the family dog and miniature donkeys were a bonus. Alisha is a lovely host. We will be back!

Shari's place is the most thoughtfully and generously stocked AirBnB we have encountered. She has thought of everything. The place is spacious, quiet and very comfortable. We highly recommend this and would stay again.
This apartment was awesome!!! So clean and super cozy. Not to mention- the beds were so comfy. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone! :))
Shari is always responsive and was flexible and accommodating with some changes we needed to make. The neighborhood is very quiet, and the beds were incredibly comfortable.
Shari's place was wonderful! Everything was perfect and she was a great host.

We enjoyed our stay at Shari’s. She thought of everything to make her guests comfortable! Lots of nightlights & Kleenex (majority of Airbnb’s we’ve stayed at don’t provide those 2 items), lots of food items, milk, juice, etc provided. Would stay here again!
large accommodation with two separate bedrooms, well equipped, we were able to wash our laundry easily and quickly. an attached parking space, easy to access. we recommend
Great place to stay and very helpful host!
Shari's place was wonderful. It was close to town, easy to find, and clean. We would love to stay at Shari's again if we are ever back in the area.
Accommodations were exactly as described. We found more extras than usual—very thoughtful!
It was a fabulous stay and Shari went above and beyond to make us feel at home

Was perfect, great place to stay in Walla Walla
will definitely keep it as a reference for the next time I need to stay in Walla Walla!!
The place was perfect for 4 us girls. It had everything we needed. It wouldn’t be ideal for people with mobility issues.
Great Airbnb, served our needs perfectly. Thank you, Shari, for a nice stay in Walla Walla.
Great little casita. Everything was very clean and comfortable. Plenty of space. Quiet. Not right next to downtown but that was clear from the map and was partly why it was quiet. Highly recommend!
Very responsive host and comfortable home!

Shari is amazing! Her SAS apartment is more than home - it’s so cozy and has all the extra touches such as, shower accessories, English muffins and Jam, a cozy fireplace - we absolutely love this stay!
Thank you Shari.

Shari's place was easy to locate with the instructions provided. A lot of amenities from coffee,tea,OJ, and milk.
Restroom extras which I have yet to see a host provide. Color pencil for children. We enjoyed our stay as it felt like home.
we had an issue with our plans and Shari, helped us out and made it easy for us to stay. Will definitely stay again if the space is available next time we're in town. had a great stay.
Central location for Walla Walla! Love staying here. Has everything we need! And Shari is so helpful and thoughtful!
Large 2 bedroom apartment with full kitchen and bathroom. Good location with parking close to unit.

Shari was very responsive and the place was even better than described. This place felt like home. It was very cozy, quiet, and close to everything! Shari has thought of every amenity that one could need while traveling and has gone above and beyond with them. We were in town for our son's basketball tournament at Walla Walla University. We were so close to the gyms and enjoyed just as much time in the apartment as we did at the games. This is an annual tournament and we hope to stay here again next year. We are very thankful for Shari's place and the wonderful hospitality.

Shari is a great host she is really nice and she responds quickly to our questions. She is also very flexible and understanding and even let my family have dinner with me for a night :). The place is larger than it looks in the picture there is more space than you think-very spacious. The house is really stocked and I will definitely recommend this place!
We were in town for a swim meet. We felt right at home at this Airbnb. It was clean, comfortable, and in a good neighborhood. Shari provided everything we needed to enjoy our weekend in Walla Walla.
a nice place to stay close to city center and everything

Shari’s place was super comfortable and functional. One of the most well-stocked and equipped places we’ve stayed in, in terms of kitchen and bathroom. Lots of little extras - Shari has thought about everything guests might need, which we really appreciated.

We had a great stay at Shari’s . It was close to lots of restaurants and grocery stores and near my family we were visiting so it was the perfect location . It was clean and quiet and the kitchen and bathroom were stocked with so many things in case you forgot anything. Would definitely stay here again
Shari’s home was perfect and my mom and brother felt very comfortable. She went above and beyond with her hospitality.
Spacious, functional, central location, great communication,

This was one of the best stays I've had. It was in a quiet area and we fit our two cars easily and the private parking. It was the little touches that I loved: umbrellas and a reusable grocery bag on the coat rack for guest use, a fully stocked kitchen with disposable plates and silverware, and lots of towels! Shari was a great host and very responsive!

Shari was very helpful and provided clear instructions for checking in! We also appreciated that there were a lot of snacks! The place was very clean and organized. We would love to come back and stay at Shari’s place again :)
It was affordable, clean, quiet, and very comfortable. Couldn’t ask for more.

Shari was a great host! She represented her place accurately. It was cozy, clean and comfortable. She was especially thoughtful and generous with the amenities she provided! The kitchen was well stocked with breakfast offerings and other items we might enjoy. We were off wine tasting most of the time we were in Walla Walla, but also enjoyed coming here for the evening and breakfast! I would highly recommend her place to friends and family and would definitely come here again! Thank you, Shari!

Amazing, super clean apartment and will absolutely stay here again on my next trip to Walla Walla. Great location and safe neighborhood. Shari is a phenomenal host. Super responsive to all my questions and any communication.
Very convenient location. We talk right at home.
A good place to rest, thank you!
I enjoyed my stay and all the extras you added to make me comfortable

Shari's was great. extremely clean, as described, and a little more spacious than anticipated. everything has been thought of, and there are signs around the house to help you navigate any quest you might have in the new space. would highly recommend this listing
Very comfortable and clean place to stay. Easy, short drive to wineries and great restaurants. Safe and quiet neighborhood. Perfect host- answered our questions but gave us our space.
Shari’s place worked great for us. She was so thoughtful in her extras for guests. Hubby was thrilled to find ice cream in the freezer!
Felt right at home.

This was the perfect place to stay while we dropped our daughter off for college. We had my mom with us, so we needed 2 bedrooms, and Shari's place is clean, quiet, and cozy.
Shari's place was very comfortable and pleasant.
The owner was very communicative and friendly. the place was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay And would happily stay again when we visit Walla Walla
Very comfortable and spacious, espcially for one person! I don't know that I will have a reason to be back in Walla Walla anytime soon, but I would most definitely stay there again if I did!
Exactly as advertised, just what we needed for our stay. Shari provides some unique and very helpful amenities like breakfast bites and extra bedding, fans, etc. we loved our stay!

Shari’s place was like staying with a family member, very homey and comfortable. Nice size place with everything I needed and more. Shari provided great communication and support. Overall great experience.

Your own off-street parking spot. Shari's has a wide assortment of coffee and snacks, and charm. Excellent.

The space was much larger than anticipated. I could not believe how much space we had in there! there were lots of helpful items in the kitchen, snuggly blankets, and homey items. Shari went way out of her way to help me retrieve a forgotten item and her kindness was a highlight in my road trip.
A clean well stocked apartment. Comfortable beds.

Shhh. Don’t tell anyone. Shari’s place is the best kept secret in Walla Walla. Clean, comfy, and generous on amenities. We enjoyed going to pioneer park and seeing the aviary. Some of the happiest birds you’ve ever seen! Shari’s place is highly recommended! A+.
This was a very comfortable place. I enjoyed the rose bushes along the walkway. It was nice to have a washer and dryer, though, I didn't need them. I would stay here again if I was in the area.
Wonderful host, I left my keys there and she got back to me right away to help me out. She’s amazing!
Just perfect. Wonderful hospitality, very comfortable, just everything was easy and hassle-free. Thank you or a great stay!
Nice comfortable daylight basement apartment. Comfy bed and useful amenities in the kitchen. Quiet location, simple decor.
Perfect place for a long weekend in Walla Walla. Private and quiet. All the personal touches, coffee, snacks in the fridge and in the cupboards. We absolutely loved it and will stay again!

We absolutely loved this space. Shari had the place spotless and clean. There were even snack items and other amenities which was much appreciated. We will definitely look at this option again next time we need a place to stay in Walla Walla.
Had a great stay in a wonderful place!

I highly recommend this location! It’s in a quiet neighborhood, but not too far away from downtown. The space was clean and equipped with everything you could need for your stay, including extra toiletries and coffee! Great value.
Perfect location for a quick drive to local wineries and restaurants. Would love to stay in again for another Walla Walla visit.
Sharis place was perfect for what we needed and very spacious. She was great and extraordinarily responsive !

Felt so comfortable and peaceful.
Just what we needed!

Shari was a great host and very responsive. Her place is well stocked and had lots of nice amenities. It is also very quiet and comfortable. We hope to come back again upon our next visit to the area.

Shari’s place was very clean, comfortable and private. It was perfect for our quick family weekend, celebrating our dear auntie who turned 100 years old!! There were a lot of very thoughtful and extra touches that made our stay quite enjoyable. Shari Is a great host who communicates extremely well.
my daughter liked the place, I'll stay there again if available
Great place definitely recommend!
Nice clean comfortable place, bigger than expected with thoughtful amenities. The coffee and breakfast items were a nice treat! I hope to stay here again!

An excellent place, with privacy & spacious accommodations.

Very good value!

We chose an air bnb for our stay in Walla Walla instead of a hotel because we wanted
something more comfortable as we had our baby with us. This space was exactly that. Clean, comfortable, and quiet. Would definitely stay here again.
The only “complaint” (if you wanna call it that) was that the turn into the parking space from the alley very tight if you have an suv. Otherwise, we enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend this spot.

Not a lot to say- absolutely matched the posting- bed was comfy, check-in instructions were clear and detailed, from street/alley directions, to parking, to the key lockbox. Great weekend at the Walla Walla Guitar Festival- I highly recommend it if you’re there in March. 😁
Cute and quiet place for a quick overnight trip. The host was responsive and her instructions to find the place and get inside were great!

I just needed one night by myself for a quiet nights sleep. That's exactly what I got. Clean place, comfortable bed. Coffee supplies ready to go. This place will be my go to when coming to Walla Walla in the future.

Shari’s place was exactly what I was looking for. It was comfortable, relatively close to a great grocery store (Andy’s Market) and coffee shops. It’s also walking distance to Walla Walla University. The kitchen is super well equipped, and the washer and dryer are a huge plus.
The unit is, however, in College Place, not Walla Walla proper, so it’s a distance from downtown if that’s a goal.
I would stay here again without reservation.
Highly recommend if you need to stay in area. Quiet area and great location. My family's first experience with an AirBNB and will definitely be looking into them more often due to our visit.
Amazing host, and a great place to stay at college place!
cute basement apartment. clean & tidy. well stocked kitchen. even had snacks!! comfortable beds.
Great clean space, easy check in and over all perfect for our family overnight trip!

A very nice basement apartment that is well stocked, clean and comfortable. Sleeps 3 in two bedrooms very comfortably. We only stayed one night but could have easily stayed longer.
My first experience with an Airbnb was not very good and I was a little hesitant to do it again. But our stay here at Shari's was very nice. I go to Walla Walla a lot and look forward to staying with Shari in the future and hopefully longer than for one night.

This was the perfect little place for our stop over in College Place. Everything we needed was provided, plenty of bedding, towels, some toiletries, coffee and creamer, even English muffins and lovely jam for the morning. Plenty of room for mom, dad, oldest child with her toddler and big teen boy on the couch. Nice safe location easy to get in. We’d definitely stay a again.

This was the perfect spot for us. And we will definitely re-book.
Two nights in a LOVELY space. It’s like a huge studio. With a killer bathroom.
The view was just stunning, and the room felt like someone really took the time to make it welcoming.
Super comfortable bed, tons of options for hanging out, a cool crows nest which we visited once or twice, the high winds kept us off of that a bit!
Awesome location, easy to get to Walla Walla (20 minutes), easy to get to Pendleton (30 minutes).

Samantha was absolutely communicative and responsive 👍🏼
Thank you so much for letting us stay!

The scenery was amazing. The lodging itself was lovely. Very clean, comfortable. Samantha and her family made us feel incredibly welcome. Highly recommend. We will definitely be back!
Thanks for a great stay!
Such a wonderful relaxing place ! Lots of wineries close by to discover.. if you want the total wine experience this for you.

We loved our stay. It was so peaceful and beautiful. Exactly what we wanted. We loved walking the vineyard and the view from this place was lovely. Easy, short drive to restaurants in Walla Walla and wineries.

We absolutely loved our stay! I thoroughly research our vacations & I couldn’t find anything that came close to the Crow’s Nest in value & beauty! You would normally have to spend hundreds more a night to stay at a property of this caliber. Crow’s Nest is simply stunning!

Due to weather conditions our stay included 2 nights of windmills that sounded like hovering helicopters. We have learned a valuable lesson about staying in a vineyard, no fault of Samantha. We were just unlucky with the weather.

Booked the Crow’s nest for a last minute weekend trip. Space is open, very clean and super cute. Samantha was quick to respond to messages and provided recommendations on the nearby wineries. Would recommend a stay here, especially when the winery opens to the public!
Such a great place to stay. Very unique, cozy, and well appointed. Samantha is a great host!
The place is beautiful and peaceful, just as described. Definitely looking to come back!
We very much enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back! And tell all our friends!

While it was foggy during our stay, we did peek up top for the gorgeous view of the surrounding vines. This property is an active winery, so there will be a little noise during the day, but nothing overly disruptive - it is 100% worth it for the unique setting and truly peaceful nights. We feel like we found a hidden gem and can’t wait to come back! Also, thank you to the reviewer who recommended Patty’s - excellent Mexican food.

Beautiful gem. Peaceful and clean.
Positive energy and we will be back.

Loved the feel of this spot. Being amongst the vineyard was fantastic. The view from the porch can’t be beat. Just wish there was at least a hot plate and one pan as it is more remote to make a lazy morning even more perfect.
Just wow. So beautiful. We had everything we needed and then some, very comfortable stay. Such a nice retreat for a weekend getaway!
Beautiful place overlooking a lovely vineyard. Was perfect for us as we were trying to break up a road trip. We got lucky finding this place!
Beautiful place! Will recommend to couples. 😍

A MUST STAY! An absolutely beautiful and romantic place to stay. We only booked for 1 night and wished we had booked our entire stay there. No reason to leave when you’re staying above a lovely winery! Thank you for making our anniversary so special, we will be returning next year!
Great celebratory stay. Overall clean and great views!

One of the most accommodating hosts. tranquil setting overlooking the vineyards; rooftop view superb; comfy bed; nice shower; perfect for a couples getaway; bonus to see & learn about the grape- picking; would definitely return; thanks Samantha!
We will absolutely book again, clean and cozy and beautiful!
Incredible place, wish we had more time there!!!

My wife and I loved the experience. The bottle of wine, snacks, and warm feel were definitely worth it. Try out Patty's for some excellent tacos and drinks. Milton-Freewater is definitely unrated for sure. we will back. Thanks.
This space was amazing and a great romantic getaway for our anniversary. The space exceeded expectations. There isn’t much of a kitchen space, but we knew that when we booked.
This is a beautiful apartment on a gorgeous vineyard! We couldn’t have asked for anything more on our trip to Walla Walla! We’d love to return when their vineyard is open to the public too!

Samantha and her husband have made a fantastic retreat for people. It's located above a working vineyard, which is what we look for when we book on airbnb-an experience!! The unit was very comfy and the views were spectacular. It stayed cool in 98 degree heat and we had plenty of space for two people. It was so quiet out there that it reminded us of our childhoods on the farms we grew up on. I wouldn't change a single thing about our trip and can't wait to visit again once the tasting room is open-we will be following their journey! Thank you guys for opening your property and soon to be business to help us have a relaxing trip.
It is such a beautiful place right on the winery. Host came out and told us about the winery and grapes they grow on the property. We had an amazing stay. We highly recommended it.

Samantha's place was one of our favorite stays with Airbnb! Such a beautiful setting and everything was so plush, clean, and new. Such a beautiful loft! And the view of the vineyard was amazing !

beautiful area, secluded, and quiet.

Well appointed- Lovely place to stay! Well stocked with anything you might need. Very clean and new. Private quiet country setting with beautiful peaceful views.

Clean and quite nestled in the walla walla

Peaceful and safe neighborhood. Spacious and well-appointed home.

Perfect place for us!!
Great host! Communication was excellent and Host went above and beyond in assisting in multiple ways!
Very clean and comfortable. Bed was super comfy too making for a good nights rest. Very roomy place. I would rent it for a long term stay if needed.

Best AirBnB experience! It is a beautiful and comfortable space. Laura is an amazing host!

such a welcoming, comfortable space ... everything we needed & more - will recommend to friends and hope to stay again when we visit Walla Walla

Fabulous!
